fields.name: Microlite 1400 Winter Sleeping Bag
fields.description: Perfect for colder conditions, the Microlite 1400 Sleeping bag is a great season 3/4 sleeping bag

fields.name: Summit 250 Square Winter Sleeping Bag
fields.description: The Summit 250 Square Sleeping Bag is perfect for colder camping adventures.

fields.name: Microlite 500 Square Mid Season Sleeping Bag
fields.description: The Microlite 500 Square Sleeping Bag is a great season 3 sleeping bag, soft and cosy for comfy evenings outside.

fields.name: Traveller 50 Lightweight Summer Sleeping Bag
fields.description: The Traveller 50 Sleeping Bag is rated at season 2 making it incredibly compact and lightweight, best for travelling in warm climates. It's soft and insulating keeping you cosy and comfy all night.

fields.name: Groundsheet - 1.8 x 1.2m
fields.description: The groundsheet is designed for tents without an integrated groundsheet. Offering additional protection from the elements, it's water- and mildewproof and has integral metal eyelets as part of its construction.

fields.name: Richmond 6-Man Tunnel Tent
fields.description: Our Richmond 6-Man Tunnel Tent boasts a durable 4000HH fly sheet, a practical sewn-in ground sheet and large living storage area. With a darkened inner tent and a window with curtain to guarantee the best sleep, it is ideal for family trips and festivals. Offering an abundance of space with separate living and sleeping areas, complete with lamp holder and zipped divider.

fields.name: Solo 1 Berth Tent
fields.description: The Solo is a trekking and wild camping tent that is designed for ease of use and comfort. The outer flysheet design is ideal for pitching in bad weather, keeping the inner tent dry. The waterproof Ripstop polyester with 5,000mm H/H and sewn-in groundsheet will keep you warm and dry in all weather.The Tent includes a 1 berth bedroom inner tent with a zip door and fly mesh panel to ensure comfort and utlises lightweight alloy poles.

fields.name: Mokala 450 4 Man Tent
fields.description: The Vango Mokala 450 is a versatile 4-man tent ideal for spontaneous adventures or longer breaks. A key feature of the Mokala is the multi-use front door that offers flexibility and added ventilation; king poles allow the front door to be made into a canopy to provide shelter from all weathers or roll it back fully to enjoy an open space. It also benefits from a rear door that offers flexibility and added ventilation, which leads to dedicated rear storage space, perfect for hiding away all your kit. Generous stand-up height throughout gives a spacious feel, while King sized bedrooms with Nightfall fabric ensure you sleep comfortably through the night. The Mokala is the perfect tent to enjoy the outdoors. Includes king poles for the front door.

fields.name: Flocked Double Air Bed
fields.description: The Double Size Flocked Airbed is a great blow up bed with a soft velour finish. Easy to inflate, it is compact when not in use and a super comfy bed for camping, caravanning or as a spare at home for guests. Inflated Dimensions - 191 x 137 x 22 cm

fields.name: Single Flocked Air Bed
fields.description: Our Single Size Flocked Airbed is a great inflatable bed for camping trips and surprise overnight guests. With a soft velour finish, this easy to inflate and compact to store pump-inflated air bed is essential. Inflated Dimensions - 191 x 73 x 22cm

fields.name: Padded Folding Chair
fields.description: The Padded Folding Chair is ideal for camping and general outdoor use. It is made with a durable, lightweight steel frame and has padding for extra comfort. It also folds away, making it easy to store when not in use. Size guidelines Approximately 67cm x 60cm x 90cm.

fields.name: Bivvy Table
fields.description: Our Bivvy Table is made of heavyweight materials with a sturdy frame. It folds down to a compact size - ideal for taking with you on outdoor adventures.

fields.name: Porta Potti 165 Flushable Camping Toilet
fields.description: Enjoy the comfort and convenience of a fully functional flushing toilet! Thetford's Porta Potti features an award winning design ideal for RVs, boats, trucks, vans, healthcare, camping and even off-the-grid lifestyle. Features a modern appearance with a durable, easy-to-use and clean design. Comes with a removable seat and cover.

fields.name: Adventurer Mens Waterproof Hiking Boots
fields.description: The Adventurer Waterproof Boots will protect, grip and give comfort for walks and hiking. They're our entry level waterproof boot with a durable synthetic upper, cushioned footbed and a deep lugs outsole. This boot has been designed for outdoor walks , day trips and dog walking.

fields.name: Skye Womens Waterproof Leather Walking Boots
fields.description: Our Skye Womens Waterproof Vibram Walking Boots are part of our premium footwear range. They are made with IsoDry technology for the highest outdoor performance. Made with leather uppers and mesh inners, these boots will keep your feet dry when you're out in wet conditions. They have durable Vibram soles for superior traction and padded ankles for comfort.

fields.name: Rapid Mens Waterproof Hiking Boots
fields.description: The Rapid Waterproof Hiking Boots are the ideal footwear for your next hiking adventure. With a suede upper, breathable mesh lining, deep lugs for high traction and heel and toe bumpers for added durability.

fields.name: Endurance Isocool Mens Active T-Shirt
fields.description: The Endurance T-Shirt is ideal for hiking and any other sports. The IsoCool fabric is breathable, quick-drying and high wicking with inbuilt UV protection of UPF50, to keep you cool, comfortable and protected.

fields.name: Active Intensity Mens Baselayer Pants
fields.description: Active intensity is an innovative baselayer that provides excellent function during intense activities in mild to cold conditions. Functional, stretchy fabric in combination with seamless design, bodymapped structures and athletic fit ensure great body-temperature management and comfort. The perfect choice for dedicated sports enthusiasts, active intensity pants work excellent for high-intensity workouts such as cross-country skiing, running and cycling.

fields.name: Advance Essence Mens Compression Training Tights
fields.description: ADV Essence Compression Tights are our favourite compression tights with excellent muscle support and elasticity. Made of Lycra Sport Energy jersey, these advanced training tights offer excellent stretch and recovery power for optimal freedom of movement, fit and shape retention during high-intensity workouts. Graduated compression ensures comfortable muscle support and stability.

fields.name: Under Armour Heatgear Mens Sport Socks
fields.description: These socks are breathable, anti-odour, and moisture wicking. The cushioned sole allows for a comfortable all day wear. A must have for any wardrobe.

fields.name: Large Karabiner
fields.description: The classic, trusted quality of Farberware pairs nicely with this durable stainless steel teakettle. Gelatin, hot chocolate or a cup of soupthe uses for a teakettle don't stop at tea.  whistle feature signals when water is at a boil removable lid makes kettle easy to fill 2-qt. capacity Stainless steel. Dishwasher safe. Imported.

fields.name: Microfibre Travel Towel - Medium - 120 x 60cm
fields.description: The Microfibre Travel Towel is an essential part of any adventurers backpack. Compact, lightweight and super absorbent, it provides more than enough towel for your needs.

fields.name: Apex Sleeping Bag Patterned
fields.description: When your workday calls for a heavyweight tee, grab this long-sleeve one from Dickies and enjoy industrial-strength comfort from the brand you trust.  chest pocket tagless back neck taped neck and shoulder seams cotton washable imported

fields.name: Bookworm 20L Backpack
fields.description: The Bookworm 20L Backpack is perfect for everyday use. With a detachable pencil case, mesh bottle pocket and an elasticated inner pocket - it's perfect as a school bag or for a day out. Dimensions: 40.5 (H) x 29 (W) x 14 (D) cm.

fields.name: Folding Solar USB Lantern
fields.description: Our Folding Solar USB Lantern is suitable to hang from your tent, parasols, gazebos and other outdoor equipment. When you are done using it, it fold into a small and compact format, ready for your next destination! The lamp has 7 SMD LED bulbs, 2 light modes (high/low) and is powered by a 3.7V 500mA lithium battery. USB included.

fields.name: Food Flask With Handle 1.2 litre
fields.description: The 1.2 Litre Food Flask with handle is perfect for keeping any food or liquid warm for up to 12 hours. With a dual purpose twist and pour stopper with a wide mouth, it's great for sharing on days outdoors.

fields.name: Walker Pole
fields.description: The Walker Pole is durable and lightweight, great for use in a variety of outdoor environments. With a traditional T-bar handle, this telescopic pole is perfect for providing style and stability on the trail.

fields.name: Bowfell Walking Pole
fields.description: The Bowfell Walking Pole is compact and easy to carry. Designed with lightweight fibreglass. Ideal for hikers and trekkers. This is an adjustable 4 section telescopic pole with a fast locking mechanism. Comes with a wrist strap. Extended length: 135cm

fields.name: Hiker Walking Pole
fields.description: Keep your feet happy with our soft tufted bath rugs. They're available in a variety of complementary colors to suit your style.  ultra-soft 1" pile microfiber polyester durable, tufted design resists matting nonskid latex backing Each rug sold separately. Polyester. Washable. Imported. Available in sizes 17x24", 21x34", or 27x45"

fields.name: Bike & Sport Bottle - 700ml
fields.description: The Bike & Sport Bottle is great for the gym, cycling or everyday use. It's designed of BPA free plastic with a leakproof spout, which can be removed for easy filling, and it fits into most bike bottle cages.

fields.name: BPA Free Push Lid Water Bottle - 700ml
fields.description: Stay hydrated on the go with the BPA Free Push Lid Bottle. Made of BPA free plastic, with a bite valve design and leak proof lid – an easy and mess-free way to keep up with your water intake while you're on the move.

fields.name: BPA-Free Ombre Push-Lid Water Bottle - 600ml
fields.description: On the go, in the gym or at work - make sure you stay hydrated with the Ombre Push-Lid Water Bottle. It's designed in BPA-free plastic with a bite valve for easy use and a leakproof lid for safe transport when you're on the move.

fields.name: 1L Printed Metallic Water Bottle With Karabiner
fields.description: The Printed Metallic 1L Water Bottle With Karabiner is great for taking into the woods. With a leakproof rubber seal for easy use. The attached karabiner can be hooked round your backpack, making sure you're kept hydrated all day.

fields.name: Emergency Foil Blanket
fields.description: The Emergency Foil Blanket is an essential piece of equipment when camping and hiking. In cases of emergency the blanket is wrapped around the body to keep the core temperature at the correct level, reflecting 80% of radiated heat making it suitable for incidences of extreme cold. Windproof and waterproof as well as being highly light reflective, this blanket is a must have when pursuing extreme activities.

fields.name: Large LED USB Lantern
fields.description: Our Large Led USB Lantern was designed with durability in mind. It is impact-resistant (up to 1m) and weather-resistant (IPx4). The 5W LED bulb creates a mild, non-dazing light. With a beam distance of 10 metres and 7 hours of run time, it is the ultimate camping accessory. Battery: 2xLi-on 18650 batteries.Size: 245mm (L), 123 mm (D).Total charging time: 8 hours.

fields.name: Thunderstorm Mens 3 in 1 Waterproof Jacket
fields.description: Suitable for all year round, the Thunderstorm Mens 3 in 1 Jacket is versatile and practical. A waterproof and breathable outer with taped seams and adjustable features for weather protection, whilst the detachable fleece provides warmth.

fields.name: Pakka Womens Waterproof Overtrousers
fields.description: The Pakka Womens Waterproof Overtrousers are great for everyday wear. Fully waterproof, thanks to our IsoDry fabric. Designed with pocket access and touch strap ankle openings, allowing you to wear them over your regular trousers.

fields.name: Seasons II Mens Padded Jacket
fields.description: The Seasons Padded Jacket keeps you warm and protected when the temperatures start to drop. It has a water-resistant outer and is filled with microfiber filler - this jacket is great for everyday wear.

fields.name: Pakka II Kids Waterproof Overtrousers
fields.description: Our Pakka II Kids Overtrousers are a practical, lightweight and breathable pair of waterproof trousers, ideal for keeping stashed in their school bag.

fields.name: Snowdon II Mens Fleece
fields.description: If you're looking for that indulgent, soft fleece feel with an improved fit, the Snowdon II Mens Fleece is the one for you. Designed in a delightfully soft touch microfleece, the antipill fabric will remain soft even after washing. The breathable fabric means it also dries quickly, making it a brilliant piece for exploring the wilderness.

fields.name: Pakka II Mens Waterproof Jacket
fields.description: Keep the weather at bay with our Pakka II Mens Jacket. Fully waterproof with taped seams, breathable membrane and pack away hood - so you can continue your adventure rain or shine.

fields.name: Glacier II Mens Long Waterproof Jacket
fields.description: The Glacier II Extreme Mens Long Waterproof Jacket, with its long body and breathable design, is great for everyday. This feature-packed jacket is a great companion on rainy dog walks and jaunts across the moors.

fields.name: Zeta Mens Zip Neck Top
fields.description: Our Zeta Mens Zip Neck Top is warm and cosy. It's a casual jumper made in a cotton-polyester blend that makes it very comfortable and lightweight, great to wear at home or outside.

fields.name: Nevis Extreme 65 + 15 Litre Rucksack
fields.description: The Nevis Extreme Rucksack has all you need for your trekking expedition, providing you with a 65L rucksack and 15L daypack in one, with a hardwearing design. The large rucksack features an adjustable back system, lots of pockets, adjustable padded shoulder straps and a hip belt. The daypack is compact with a spacious main compartment and can easily be detached. Dimensions: 85 (H) x 43 (W) x 35 (D) cm.

fields.name: Tor 65L Rucksack
fields.description: The Tor 65 Litre Rucksack is a great Backpack for travelling. Packed with great features this large rucksack includes a padded air mesh back, a dividable main compartment, load balance and back adjusters for comfort while carrying a heavy load. Available in our Women's Fit for selected colours. Dimensions: 71 (H) x 52 (W) x 35 (D) cm.
